subject: Peace
text:
There's good and bad in every race. 
There's many shades to the human face. 
There's only one kind of man I know. 
The human kind with heart and soul. 
There's a man under each shade of skin. 
This fight on prejudice we hope to win. 
There's a spirit dwelling inside each man. 
Look a little deeper and you'll understand. 
That all we need is love and peace. 
Then the spirit of man will never cease.
